matches.explanation: Exact match: Red Team's 'S3 bucket lacks server-side encryption' on cicd_artifacts was detected as 'S3 Bucket Lacks Encryption' on cicd_artifacts
Partial match: Red Team's 'SSH port open to entire internet' on build_agents was partially detected as 'Unrestricted SSH Access' on build_agents
Partial match: Red Team's 'No logging for sensitive artifact bucket' on cicd_artifacts was partially detected as 'Missing Public Access Block' on cicd_artifacts
No matching finding for vulnerability: No explicit public access restrictions
Exact match: Red Team's 'Database storage not encrypted' on build_metadata was detected as 'Database Not Encrypted' on build_metadata
